# PKPassLibraryAddPassesStatus.shouldReviewPasses

**Case**

A status that occurs when the app prompts the user to review the passes.

## Declaration

```swift
case shouldReviewPasses
```

## Constants

- **PKPassLibraryAddPassesStatus.didAddPasses**: A status that occurs when the user successfully adds one or more passes.
- **PKPassLibraryAddPassesStatus.didCancelAddPasses**: A status that occurs when the user cancels the addition of passes.
